articles.author: Kevin Breuninger
articles.title: American Express to pay $230 million to settle DOJ fraud probe, deceptive marketing claim - CNBC
articles.description: The American Express settlement follows recent agreements by Mastercard and Block to settle claims from prosecutors or regulators.
articles.content:
American Express will pay a total of about $230 million to resolve federal wire fraud investigations and to settle civil allegations of deceptive marketing, the company said Thursday.
